entry.title: The Maserati GranCabrio Is a Tough Sell For $200,000+

media:group.media:description:
CHECK OUT CARS & BIDS! https://crsnbds.com/doug
This is the new 2024 Maserati GranCabrio and it looks a lot like the old one. The new GranCabrio is a good car with modern tech, a nice interior, and a fun driving experience. The problem is that it costs way too much money. Today I'm reviewing this Maserati GranCabrio, and I'll show you the many quirks and features. I'm also going to get behind the wheel and show you what it's like to drive.
CHECK OUT CARS & BIDS! https://crsnbds.com/doug

entry.title: The Mercedes-Benz C43 AMG Was Insane in the 1990s

media:group.media:description:
CHECK OUT THIS 1999 MERCEDES-BENZ C43 AMG ON CARS & BIDS! https://crsnbds.com/c43-amg
This is a 1999 Mercedes-Benz C43 AMG and it's hard to explain how insane this car was when it came out. This car may look unassuming, but its V8 with over 300 horsepower makes it a true wolf in sheep's clothing. We are thrilled to be offering this C43 AMG for sale on CARS & BIDS!! Today, I'm reviewing it and I'll show you the many quirks and features. I'll also get behind the wheel and review the driving experience.

entry.title: The 2025 Honda Civic Hybrid Is the Best Overall Civic

media:group.media:description:
CHECK OUT CARS & BIDS! https://crsnbds.com/doug
This is the new 2025 Honda Civic Hybrid and it may just be the best all around Civic you can buy. The Civic Hybrid is a great example of how to pack a lot of benefits, like good tech, great fuel economy, and decent power into a relatively affordable package. Today I'm reviewing this Honda Civic Hybrid, and I'll show you the many quirks and features. I'm also going to get behind the wheel and show you what it's like to drive.

entry.title: The 2025 Audi SQ6 E-Tron Is Surprisingly Cool and Fun

media:group.media:description:
CHECK OUT CARS & BIDS! https://crsnbds.com/doug
This is the new 2025 Audi SQ6 E-Tron and it's a surprisingly fun electric SUV. Audi's previous EV SUVs were lackluster, but this is a much stronger effort with good power and range, interesting quirks, and decent pricing. Today I'm reviewing this SQ6 E-Tron, and I'll show you the many quirks and features. I'm also going to get behind the wheel and show you what it's like to drive.

entry.title: The Pontiac Mera Is the Craziest Fake Ferrari Ever

media:group.media:description:
CHECK OUT THIS 1988 PONTIAC FIERO MERA ON CARS & BIDS! https://crsnbds.com/fiero-mera
This is a 1988 Pontiac Fiero, but it looks like a Ferrari 308. It was called the Pontiac Mera and some Pontiac dealers actually sold these Ferrari replicas new... until Ferrari sued them. Buckle up for the crazy and quirky Pontiac Mera story. We are thrilled to be offering this fake Ferrari for sale on CARS & BIDS!! Today, I'm reviewing it and I'll show you the many quirks and features. I'll also get behind the wheel and review the driving experience.

entry.title: The Fangchengbao Leopard 5 Is a Quirky, Cool Chinese Off-Roader

media:group.media:description:
CHECK OUT CARS & BIDS! https://crsnbds.com/doug
This is the new Fangchengbao Leopard 5 and it's an incredibly quirky Chinese luxury off-roader SUV. The Leopard 5 is similar in size and capability to the 4Runner, Wrangler, and Bronco, but it has almost 700 horsepower and a much cheaper price tag. Today I'm reviewing this Fangchengbao Leopard 5, and I'll show you the MANY quirks and features. I'm also going to get behind the wheel and show you what it's like to drive.

entry.title: The Mitsubishi 3000GT VR-4 Spyder Was Peak Insane Japanese Sports Car

media:group.media:description:
CHECK OUT THIS 1995 MITSUBISHI 3000GT VR-4 SPYDER ON CARS & BIDS! https://crsnbds.com/3000gt-vr4
This is a 1995 Mitsubishi 3000GT VR-4 Spyder and it's a super rare and quirky convertible version of the popular 3000GT. A power operated retractable hardtop was a huge deal back in the '90s and that's proven by the outrageous original sticker price of this car. We are thrilled to be offering this VR-4 Spyder for sale on CARS & BIDS!! Today, I'm reviewing it and I'll show you the many quirks and features. I'll also get behind the wheel and review the driving experience.
